info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent - package info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent
 
IterativeParallelism - Class in info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent
Runs in parallel task on List using main function IterativeParallelism.parallelizeFunction(int, List, Function, Function), which accepts number of threads to parallel on.
IterativeParallelism() - Constructor for class info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent.IterativeParallelism
Empty constructor.
IterativeParallelism(ParallelMapper) - Constructor for class info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent.IterativeParallelism
If you use this constructor, IterativeParallelism will use IterativeParallelism.parallelMapper object to perform all operations.

P

Main function for parallelize given task f on list, after applying function for all elements, reduces them, using reducer.
parallelMapper - Variable in class info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent.IterativeParallelism
Special class for making taks in parallel.
ParallelMapperImpl - Class in info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent
Class for parallelizing specified task on list on specified number of threads.

Constructor, needs to specify number of threads.
ParallelMapperImpl.Counter - Class in info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent
Class for synchronized counting, it is full analog of CountDownLatch.

R

T
